name: Promotion Class: Radical
description:
Role: Ranged Damage

Unpopular with members of their order for sacrificing healing for more potent throwing hammers.

Stat Adjustments:
Attack Power +225
Reduce Basic Attack Cost by 9 mana

Traits Granted:
Throwing Hammer Proficiency
Throwing Hammer Mastery
Mace Mastery
Buckler Mastery
Medium Shield Mastery

Enhancements:
Holy Symbol: Now no longer heals, but damages enemies.
Illuminate: Now increases Critical Chance with each hit until you score three Critical hits.
Flash Of Light: Transforms into Searing Light.


WARNING: Purchasing this talent promotes you to the Radical promotion class and prevents access to the Crusader and Arbiter promotion classes.
